metro.GameScreen.MainView

Class MainView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • metro.GameScreen.GameScreen
        • metro.GameScreen.MainView.MainView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class MainView
extends GameScreen
implements java.util.Observer
    The main view is the normal screen the player sees. All sub tools like the station placing tool or the train management will be organized and drawn by this tool. Furthermore it shows all player information and draws the whole map with its trains, stations and tracks.
    Author:
    Hauke
